Feature_Name: The name of the CRM feature being evaluated for its impact on patient retention.
Impact_Percentage: The percentage increase in patient retention attributed to the CRM feature.
Evaluation_Quarter: The quarter and year by which the impact of the CRM feature is evaluated, formatted as YYYY-Q[Quarter Number].
Justification_Note: A brief note justifying the selection and evaluation of the CRM feature.
Incentives through loyalty programs enhance patient commitment.
Regular updates and engagement through emails maintain patient interest.
Collecting patient feedback leads to improvements in services offered.
Telehealth provides greater access to care, improving retention.
Round-the-clock support ensures patient issues are resolved promptly.
Educational resources empower patients, leading to better retention.
Convenience in scheduling appointments online improves patient satisfaction.
Identifying effective CRM features supports strategic patient retention improvements.
Mobile apps provide easier access to services, increasing retention.
Engaging patients on social media platforms keeps them informed and engaged.
